query:
SELECT 
  p.id,
  p.address,
  p.city,
  COUNT(pi.id) as image_count,
  GROUP_CONCAT(SUBSTRING(pi.imageUrl, 1, 80) SEPARATOR ' | ') as sample_urls
FROM properties p
LEFT JOIN property_images pi ON p.id = pi.property_id
WHERE p.source = 'zillow'
GROUP BY p.id
LIMIT 10;
